    • addIfAbsentHeader

      default void addIfAbsentHeader(List<HttpHeader> headers)
      This method adds each given HttpHeader only if for the header key there is no header set already

      Special case: you can remove existing headers by providing a new one with an empty or null value

      Parameters:
      headers - to be adjusted for this request
